message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? I'm confident this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
